name: Kendu_Ultho
content:
General Kendu Ultho was an Aqualish male who led holdouts of the Confederacy of Independent Systems—which had been defeated during the Clone Wars in 19 BBY—against the Galactic Empire in 17 BBY. During the Western Reaches Operation, a campaign of the Imperial Reconquest of the Rim that sought to pacify criminal elements and Separatist holdouts in the Outer Rim Territories, Ultho and his forces joined with pirate lord Guun Cutlax of the Iska pirates in the Outer Rim's Atravis sector. Later that year, Ultho was killed fighting Imperial forces at the Outer Rim astronomical object Ogoth Tiir, a battle that saw the capture of his forces as well as the end of the Reconquest of the Rim.
Kendu Ultho was mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
